name: Thoughtfortheday
0:
”Alexa open good thoughts”
”Alexa open good thoughts and tell me a thought”
”Alexa ask good thoughts to give me a thought”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: good thoughts
des: A good positive thought can change your day. A "Thought for the Day” is your motivational seed. A nice positive thought can make your day and motivate you every day. It will inspire you with a thought whenever you ask it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
